name: Soccer Anagrams Quiz | Sports Mixed | 10 Questions

questions.text: GO GET BEERS is one of the best players of all-time.
SNIDE SWINE played with Chelsea and was formerly of Wimbledon.
DO A ONE MAD ARGI was a mad Argi.
A NERD RODENT RAN who played for Tottenham and was formerly of Portsmouth.
NO I CAN REACT as he did certainly towards the fans.
TEEN ARMY PERVS was the captain of Tottenham in the 1980s.
MR POO MAT was an international Premiership goalkeeper.
GREED PAYS was a Wales and Newcastle midfielder.
DINGLE SHANKLY was a legend at Liverpool and is now retired.
OR WHY I AM SICK is a striker who spent most of his career at Ipswich before moving to Arsenal and QPR. He is English but with an African surname.
